到達目標: 英文欄参照/Refer to the following
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: ビジネスにおける異文化コンピテンシー／Intercultural Competency in Business
授業方法:
• Utilize a wide variety of approach and experiential and interactive activities during the class and focus on student-driven exploration
• Utilize critical incidents to provide a deeper understanding of the contents
• Work individual, pair or group on topics that relate to context

第1回: Introduction to the course, Why study Intercultural Communication? Simulation activity for intercultural communication and debrief & discussions
第2回: Exercise for “encountering the unfamiliar”(DAE), Cultural models and define culture, Cultural values reflected in proverbs
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第3回: Navigating culture shock abroad – Managing cultural transitions; Reverse Culture Shock
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第4回:
Stereotypes vs. Generalizations;
Cultural frameworks #1: Individualism vs. Collectivism, Power Distance (G. Hofstede)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第5回: Cultural frameworks #2: Masculinity vs. Femininity, Uncertainty Avoidance (G. Hofstede), Universalism vs. Particularism ((F. Trompenaars)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第6回:
Cultural frameworks #3: Concept of time - Monochronic vs. Polychronic (E.T. Hall), Long-term vs. Short-term Orientation (G. Hofstede), and Sequential vs. Synchronic (F. Trompenaars)
Concept of space – Proxemics (E.T. Hall), Specific vs. Diffuse (F. Trompenaars)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第7回: Communication styles: Direct vs. Indirect Communication style, High Context and Low Context (E.T. Hall), Use of Silence and active listening
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第8回: Non-verbal communication in different cultures (E.T. Hall), Use of emotion (neutral/Emotional, F. Trompenaars)
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第9回:
Culture focus: Japan (1) – Historical, geographical, and religious influence
by comparing with students’ cultures
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第10回: Culture focus: Japan (2) – Cultural core values and mindset by comparing with students’ cultures
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第11回: Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Belonging (D,E,I&B); Managing stereotypes, bias, unconscious bias, and microaggression
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
第14回:
Summary and reflections of the course
“Developmental Model of Intercultural Sensitivity (DMIS) ”
Read assigned reading and prepare for class discussion
